Name: ReversiQuest2
About the game: ReversiQuest2 is a single-player tactical JRPG with a battle system based on Reversi. Those good ole days of pixel art, characters, and sounds reminiscent of video games of the mid 90's. No need to know the previous ReversiQuest to enjoy ReversiQuest2! ●Sharpen Your Tactics!● Stay alert! Every move drastically turns the tide of the battle! Never give up, even on a verge of death - a victorious reversal awaits! The strategies are infinite! Triumph over enemies with Reversi skills, various characters, gears, or spells...the choice is yours! ●Story and Gameplay● A young man who grew up in a remote village in Othellia Island, Nym, saves a girl named Imogen from a monster...but how will their fate turn out? Advance through board game-like fields full of gimmicks in a sandbox world drawn all in quarter view and pixel art! ●You'll Enjoy this Game if...● you love JRPGs from the mid 90's you love a stark worldview you love strategic battles
